longBusinessSummary: Skylark Holdings Co., Ltd. operates restaurants in Japan and internationally. The company also engages in the provision of food services and related businesses; sale of food products; franchise operation of yakiniku buffet restaurants and family restaurants; café, office catering, food court business, etc.; and development of restaurants, etc. It operates various Japanese, Western, and Chinese cuisine restaurants primarily under the Gusto, Bamiyan, Jonathan's, Syabu-Yo, Yumean, Steak Gusto, Grazie Gardens, Aiya, Musashino Mori Coffee, Karayoshi, Totoyamichi, chawan, Tonkaratei, La Ohana, GRAND BUFFET, Festa Garden, Papageno, Tomato and Onion, Jyu-Jyu Karubi, FLO Prestige, Café Grazie, SYABU-YO, Skylark, Aiya, YOKOHAMA  Steakhouse, and SHABU-YO brand names. The company also provides foodstuffs and concession stand products delivery, store cleaning and maintenance, and linen supply services. The company was formerly known as Skylark Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Skylark Holdings Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Skylark Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Musashino, Japan.
